sense.def:
To scrape something from a surface
ali
to scrape something off
pomeni odstraniti nekaj z neke površine tako, da po njej drgnemo z nožem ali drugim ostrim predmetom.

seg.quote: She scraped the mud off her boots.

sense.def:
To scrape something
pomeni odstraniti kožo ali zunanji sloj nečesa tako, da z nožem potegnemo po njej.

seg.quote: The nuts can be eaten raw once they have been scraped.

sense.def:
To scrape one thing against another
pomeni, da eno stvar podrgnemo ob drugo in tako povzročimo manjšo poškodbo.

seg.quote: He scraped his hand painfully on a rock.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
scrapes something
ali
scrapes against something
, se podrgne ob nekaj drugega in tisto nekoliko poškoduje ali povzroči rezek zvok.

seg.quote: In winter, the branches tapped and scraped the glass.
His beard scraped against her skin.
...the clink and scrape of knives and forks.

sense.def:
To scrape through an examination
pomeni s težavo narediti izpit.

To scrape together
ali
to scrape up an amount of money or a number of things
pomeni s težavo zbrati določen znesek ali število stvari.

seg.quote: He scraped up the money to start a restaurant.
